name: Another Rainy Morning
description:
Another Rainy Morning

This game is a simulation on what is happening on another rainy morning. The last thing you want to do on a rainy morning is to get out of the bed. You want to keep snuggling on your bed and ignore the buzzing phone, the noisy alarm, and the bugging notifications.

How to play:

  1. Hover to focus on something
  2. Click to give some of your attention on that thing
Note:
  1. The screen is a visualization of your point of view
  2. The line trail that follows the mouse is the floater that follow you vision
  3. The floating circles is floater in your eyes
Credit
  • Audios : YouTube Sound Library

Reference 

  • p5.js library: JavaScript library: https://p5js.org
  • Array: https://happycoding.io/tutorials/p5js/creating-classes
